response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, and I believe it would greatly benefit you as well. Considering its true worth and the impact it could have on your endeavors, I am extending an offer to sell it to you at a special price of $1,200,000. This represents a substantial saving compared to its market value and provides you with a unique chance to secure a high-quality asset at an advantageous rate. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 1200000}
